Welcome.SkipAuthWarning: Skipping authentication will run Particle app in limited functionality mode - you would only be able to setup Wi-Fi credentials to Photon based devices but not claim them to your account nor use Tinker or device inspector. Are you sure you want to continue?

CloudAPI.Title: API Base URL
CloudAPI.Message: Please enter Particle API Base URL

LoadingDevicesFailed.Title: Error
LoadingDevicesFailed.Message: Error loading devices, please check your internet connection.

WrongStickerError.Title: Whoops!
WrongStickerError.Message: Looks like you are scanning the wrong sticker. Please scan the ICCID barcode that came with your SIM card.

Tinker.FlashTinker: To enable Tinker, you need to flash the Tinker firmware to this device.

FlashTinker.Title: Flash Tinker?
FlashTinker.Message: Flashing will overwrite the application firmware on your Particle device with the Tinker app.

Tutorial1.Title: Welcome to Tinker!
Tutorial1.Message: Tinker is the fastest and easiest way to prototype and play with your Particle device. Access the basic input/output functions of the device pins without writing a line of code.

Tutorial2.Title: Blink the onboard LED
Tutorial2.Message: Tap any pin to get started. Start with pin D7 - select 'digitalWrite' and tap the pin, see what happens on your device. You've just flashed an LED over the internet! Reset any pin function by long-pressing it.

DeviceNotSupported.Title: Reflash Tinker
DeviceNotSupported.Message: App does not support flashing tinker to this device.

ReadingValueError.Title: Error
ReadingValueError.Message: There was an error while reading value of {{0}} pin.

UpdatingValueError.Title: Error
UpdatingValueError.Message: There was an error while updating value of {{0}} pin.

Tutorial1.Title: Welcome to Device Inspector
Tutorial1.Message: See advanced information on your device.

Tutorial2.Title: Modes
Tutorial2.Message:
Device inspector has 4 views:

Events - view a real-time searchable list of published events.

Functions - interact with your device's functions.

Variables - interact with your device's variables.

Tinker - control pin behavior for your device

Tutorial3.Title: Additional actions
Tutorial3.Message: Tap the Control Panel button to access advanced actions.
